Description: Five people were shot outside a home after returning from a bar in Modesto where they had been involved in an altercation.[12]
Five women aged 18 to 32 years old were injured by gunfire after the home they were in was shot at by an unknown person.[13]
After an argument escalated on a front porch, four people were wounded by gunfire, with one man dying later at the hospital.[14]
Two people were killed and seven injured in a drive-by shooting at a music video set.[15]
Officers responding to a call about an individual shot arrived at a house party and found four teenagers injured.[16]
Officers responding to a call of suspicious circumstances near an intersection found one man killed and two others and a woman injured.[17]

Five people were wounded by gunfire outside a night club, with an additional three injured by the resulting building damage and chaos. The shooting occurred after an altercation escalated out onto the street.[18]
Police responding to reports of shots fired discovered four wounded victims, one of which died later at the hospital.[19]
One person was killed and three injured in a shooting outside a bar, after an earlier argument in a restaurant.[20]
Four people wounded by gunfire were discovered by police after responding to a house party.[21]
Six people were wounded in a shooting in which the perpetrator was believed to have exited a vehicle and opened fire before leaving in it.[22]
Shooters wearing ski masks exited a vehicle and wounded four people before fleeing.[23]
Thirteen people were shot at a party that was held to memorialize a victim of an earlier shooting, at least one was a teenager.[24]
Seven people were wounded in an early morning shooting, including two 17-year-olds.[25]
One person was killed and six injured in an apartment complex after a drive-by shooting.[26]
Two people were killed and a police officer and bystander injured at the local Sanitation Department after a fight escalated.[27]
Two people were killed and two were injured in a late night double homicide.[28]
A resident at Babcock Village Apartments shot two employees, one fatally, and one resident before killing himself.[29]
Four people were shot at the South Park Mall.[30]
Three people are killed and one wounded in a shooting at the Emerald City Casino. The suspect was later killed by police at a different location.[31]
One man was killed and four others injured at an intersection early in the morning.[32]
Four teenagers were wounded in a drive-by shooting at an apartment complex.[33]
One man was killed and three wounded in a business parking lot.[34]

2019 Jersey City shooting: Four people were killed, including a police officer, and another three were injured in an ambush style shootout by a man and woman who were killed by police. The suspects were Black Hebrew Israelites members and targeted a kosher grocery store.[35]
Four people were discovered dead in a home, in either by a murder-suicide or a quadruple homicide. A toddler was also in the home, unharmed.[36]
Two men were killed and three injured at an apartment building. The incident was originally reported as a home invasion, although the account was not confirmed.[37]
Five people were shot outside a local bar, with one man dying of his injuries at the hospital.[38]

Naval Air Station Pensacola shooting: A man killed three individuals and injured eight more at Naval Air Station Pensacola before being killed by police. A terrorist motive is suspected to be behind the attack.[39]

2019 Miramar shootout: Four people are dead and one injured after a pair of men rob a jewelry store in Coral Gables, injuring the clerk, then carjack a UPS truck and lead police on a chase that ended in a shootout in Miramar that killed the UPS driver, a bystander, and the suspects.[40]

22-year-old Gabriel Romero, a US Navy sailor and submarine crewman, randomly opened fire just minutes after starting his shift for routine guard duty at Joint Base Pearl Harborâ€“Hickam. He opened fire on a group of civilian workers, killing two and wounded another, before immediately shooting himself. The motive is thought to be a toxic cultural environment in the USN, particularly among submarine crewman.[41]
Two people were killed and two wounded in an apartment complex.[42]
One person was killed and three police officers wounded when a home invasion turned into a hostage situation.[43]
One woman was killed and three others wounded, including one of the two perpetrators, after an argument escalated at a nightclub.[44][45]
Two people were killed and two injured at an intersection hours after the first mass shooting in the city.[46]
One person was killed and four were injured in a shooting in Aurora, Illinois.[47]

2019 New Orleans shooting: Ten people were shot in a densely populated area with heavy police presence at a time when tens of thousands of tourists were downtown for the Bayou Classic football game.[48]
Seven people were shot at a nightclub in the early morning.[49]
Five people were wounded including two children aged 10 and 15.[50]
Two men were killed and two others wounded in a drive-by shooting. One suspect was arrested after the car crashed into a parked police car.[51]
Six people were wounded at a warehouse party after an argument escalated and the perpetrator opened fire.[52]
Two people were killed and two others injured in an early morning shooting at a club.[53]

Five people were shot inside of a vehicle; the incident resulted in one death and four injuries.[354]
Three teens and one man were injured after a fight involving between 20 and 30 individuals.[355]
Four people were wounded in a shooting at West 27th and Tatnall Streets.[356]
Four people were injured and discovered after a Shot Spotter gunfire alert notified police to the location.[357]
Emergency responders discovered a female and two young children injured, and two men were later identified as being wounded in the same incident.[358]
Four men were discovered shot at Cherrywood Park after a drive-by shooting; one of the victims died from their injuries.[359]
One person was killed and three were wounded while sitting in a parked car in Boston's Dorchester neighborhood.[360]

2019 University of North Carolina at Charlotte shooting: Six people were shot, two fatally, on the last day of classes at the University of North Carolina at Charlotte. The student gunman was taken into custody after he was tackled by one of the students in the classroom. He had several more loaded magazines in a backpack.[361]
Four family members, three women and one man, were found shot to death in an apartment.[362] The shooter was given the death penalty in 2024, 2 years after a mistrial.[363]
Two men got into an altercation at a party and exchanged gunfire; seven people were wounded in the crossfire.[364]
A suspect in a vehicle opened fire on patrons outside of a nightclub, injuring four.[365]
One person was killed and seven were wounded when a gunman opened fire on two cookouts at an intersection.[366]
One person was killed and three were injured in a shooting in south Jackson.[367]
Four people were wounded in an overnight shooting.[368]
Poway synagogue shooting: One person was killed and at least three were wounded by a shooter at the Chabad of Poway synagogue.[369]
Investigators attempted to make contact with the suspect in relation to another crime, he then began to open fire, injuring three children and himself.[370]
Four people were wounded in the Grays Ferry Section of the city.[371]
Four seniors were wounded by gunfire after a suspect opened fire in the vehicle behind them.[372]
Seven people were wounded in a shooting that police believe occurred after a large fight.[373]
A disturbance in a neighborhood escalated into a shooting; four men were wounded.[374]
Two suspects fired multiple shots at people attending a party, injuring four.[375]
Four people in a vehicle were wounded when they were shot at by at least one person in another car.[376]
A drive-by shooting killed an 18-year-old male and wounded three other men in a cul-de-sac.[377]
A man opened fire inside of a bar following a disturbance, wounding four patrons.[378]
One man was killed and three were injured in an early morning shooting.[379]
Two women were killed and another man and woman were wounded in a drive-by shooting outside of Miami's Liberty City neighborhood.[380]
Four people were injured in a shooting outside of a restaurant and bar.[381]

A man killed his wife, two of his daughters, and another man, and injured two people who came to try to help one of the victims. All of the victims were shot, with the exception of one of his daughters who was killed by blunt force trauma.[382]
One person was killed and four were wounded when suspects fired at them from a car in the Watts neighborhood of Los Angeles.[383]
Four men were wounded in a shooting near Druid Hill Park.[384]
Police found four people with gunshot wounds in front of a residence.[385]
Four people were wounded in a shooting at a mobile home park.[386]
Two people were killed and three were wounded in a shooting at a motorcycle club hangout.[387]
Six people were wounded in a shooting outside of a local bar.[388]
Six young men were wounded in a shooting in the city's East Side district.[389]
At least six people were injured in a shooting at a baby shower.[390]
Four Florida A&M University students were injured in a shooting following an argument at a house party.[391]
One person was killed and three were found with gunshot injuries in Panama City.[392]
Two officers responding to a suspected hostage situation were wounded and three individuals were later found deceased in a murderâ€“suicide.[393]
A man shot four people in a drive-by shooting outside of a convenience store.[394]
Five people were wounded in a drive-by shooting at an intersection.[395]
One person was killed and four people were wounded in a shooting in East Garfield Park.[396]
One person was killed and four were wounded during a house party.[397]
Seven people were wounded in a shooting at an overnight house party.[398]
Four people were wounded in a shooting near a playground.[399]
An after-school fight led to a shooting in a neighborhood; five teenagers were wounded.[400]
A shooting occurred near the Fillmore Heritage Center around 8:40Â pm local time; one person was killed and five others were injured.[401]
During a warehouse party, a fight broke out and escalated into a shooting; seven people were wounded.[402]
An argument at a house party ended in a shooting when the perpetrator returned to the party and killed two and wounded four before fleeing.[403]
Four people were wounded after an argument, although the shooter claims that it was in self-defense to being randomly attacked.[404]
Four people were wounded at the El Cortez Hotel and Casino in an early morning shooting. The suspect was later arrested.[405]
In the early morning, two groups were involved in a dispute, which ended with one person killed and three people wounded.[406]
One man was killed and three others were wounded following a shooting at a "residential speakeasy".[407]
Two men were killed and three others were wounded in an overnight shooting behind a home. The suspect was arrested the next day.[408]
One person was fatally shot and three others were wounded, including a Montana Highway Patrol trooper following a road rage incident.[409]
One person was killed and three were wounded after gunfire erupted in a nightclub.[410]
Four men were wounded in a shooting inside of a local liquor store.[411]
A conflict between two individuals escalated into a shooting; one man was killed, and four others were injured.[412]
Three children and one adult were wounded in a drive-by shooting.[413]
Four people were injured in a shooting at a sports bar following a fight.[414]
Six people were injured in a shooting at a bar following a fight.[415]
One person was killed and four other were wounded at a party when shots were fired into a home.[416]
Two adults and their 6 and 1-year-old children were killed in an apparent murder suicide.[417]
One person was killed and four others were wounded in a shooting near a gas station.[418]
Two people were killed and two were injured in a shooting at a party in a home.[419]
Two people were killed and two others were found wounded in two separate shootings believed to be perpetrated by the same man.[420]
Officers on patrol responded to gunshots, and upon investigation discovered a deceased male and four wounded victims.[421]
A gunman perched on the roof of a home killed two and wounded two after an argument led to the incident.[422]
Three adults and a teenager were injured inside a home in a presumed targeted shooting.[423]
A 28-year-old woman killed her three children, ages 8, 6 and 2, before killing herself.[424][425][426]
Five people were wounded after shots were fired outside of a bar. Two suspects were taken into custody by police.[427]
Two people were wounded and two were killed in a shooting at an apartment complex. The suspect was later arrested in Bienville Parish, Louisiana.[428]
After police attempted to arrest a suspect, a gunfight broke out, and led to one person being killed and five being wounded.[429]

Police responded to a domestic dispute at a residence; upon arrival, the suspect fired shots at officers leading to a 12-hour hostage standoff. Four people were killed, and the suspect was taken into custody and later died.[430]
Aurora, Illinois shooting: A man opened fire in his workplace, killing five employees, and injuring five police officers and a civilian before being killed by police.[431]
After a fight broke out near a basketball court at a park, multiple people started shooting at each other. Two people were killed, and two were wounded.[432][433]
A family member heard sounds of gunfire, and upon investigation, found four adults and one toddler deceased.[434][435]
Four people were injured in a shooting outside of an apartment complex.[436]
A man was killed and three others were injured after a shooting in the lobby of an apartment building around 10:30Â pm ET.[437]
One man was killed and three others were injured after a shooting broke out in Cleveland's Clarkâ€“Fulton neighborhood.[438]
A man and woman were killed and two others injured after the shooter kicked open an apartment door and shot inside, before fleeing.[439]
Four men and an elementary-school-age girl were injured in a shooting at a bus stop.[440]
Four people were wounded in an early morning shooting.[441]
Around 2Â am local time, two people were killed and five people were wounded in a drive-by shooting after a fight outside of a club.[442]
A fight broke out at a house party and shots were fired; four people were wounded.[443]
Pecan Park Raid: Four police officers were shot while serving a warrant in southeast Houston. The two homeowners were killed.[444]
Police responded to a call and discovered five people with gunshot wounds, along with two of the victims sustaining life-threatening injuries.[445]
A gunman opened fire on individuals attending a candlelight vigil, killing one, and wounding three others.[446]
A man was asked to leave a bar; shortly after, he came back and shot five people, critically wounding two.[447]
Two people were found with bullet wounds in front of a residence, and two more arrived at a hospital with gunshot injuries from the same shooting.[448]
January 2019 Louisiana shootings: A 21-year-old man killed five people, including his parents, in two parishes in Louisiana.[449] The suspect fled to Virginia and was arrested the next day.[450]
A man killed two people and injured one inside a local bar, then drove away and broke into a home and killed the homeowner before killing himself.[451]
A man killed four individuals and injured another in two separate shootings.[452] The shooter was later arrested in Indiana.[453]
2019 Sebring shooting: At least five people were killed in a hostage incident and shooting at a bank. The suspect was taken into custody by police.[454]
Three adults and a child were wounded in a shooting while attending a block party.[455]
One person was killed and four others were wounded in a shooting at a nightclub.[456]
A man killed two people and injured two more before killing himself.[457]
In an apparent targeted shooting, four individuals were discovered shot in a building.[458]
Early in the morning, three women and a man were involved in a fight and were injured in the ensuing shooting.[459]
Three people were killed and two more were injured by a homeowner in a possible attempted home invasion.[460]
Three people were killed and another person was wounded in a shooting at a home. Two men were arrested in relation to the shooting.[461]

A man was killed and five other people were injured in a shooting. The Mayor of Jacksonville described the shooting as gang-related, although this characterization has been disputed by the sister of the deceased man.[462]
Three people were killed and another one was wounded in a shooting.[463]
An argument over a gun inside a local ice cream shop led to a shooting. One man was killed and four others, including the suspected shooter, were injured.[464]
An argument at a motel escalated into a shooting. One person was killed, and five others were injured.[465]
A man injured four people in a shooting following an argument at a party. He was arrested the same day.[466]
A man killed his wife and son in their home and injured two people who were inside a vehicle before killing himself.[467]
A man injured his brother and two friends before being killed by a police officer.[468]

An argument at the Torrance bowling alley escalated into a fight and three people were killed by gunshots, at least four others were wounded.  A suspect who was out of prison on parole has been arrested.[469]
Three children under the age of six were found deceased along with a wounded woman in an apparent home invasion.[470]
A 16-year-old boy was killed and three others were wounded during a home invasion.[471]
Five people were shot and wounded outside of a nightclub around 6am local time.[472]
Five people were shot and wounded around 3am local time at the University Village Shopping Center.[473]
